original_text: And the likeness of the firmament upon the heads of the living creature was as the colour of the terrible crystal, stretched forth over their heads above.
korean_text: 그 생물의 머리 위에는 수정 같은 궁창의 형상이 있어 보기에 두려운데 그들의 머리 위에 펼쳐져 있고

sentences.original_text: And the likeness of the firmament
upon the heads of the living creature
was as the colour of the terrible crystal
stretched forth over their heads above
